participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring, passionate, and a bit of a dreamer.
participant_1.background: I love the food my family prepares for me. I am a nurse. I love watching Grey's Anatomy. I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in. My glasses are always dirty and I cannot seem to get them clean.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, thoughtful, and a nature lover.
participant_2.background: I sometimes miss my friends because I have a pet iguana that takes up a lot of my time. I like to watch people pray together. I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch. I love seafood because I fish for it myself. I met my family through adoption, and I am so grateful to have them in my life.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What's your favorite thing to do?
I love nature documentaries. I love seeing all the different animals and plants that live in the wild.
Me too! I love to watch all the different habitats and how the animals interact with each other.
What's your favorite type of seafood?
I love salmon. It's so good!
Me too! I love to cook salmon on the grill.
I do too! It's so easy and delicious.
What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse.
Oh wow! That's a great job.
Thanks! I love it.
Do you like watching Grey's Anatomy?
I love it! It's my favorite show.
Me too! I love all the drama and the medical stuff.
Me too! It's so addictive.
What's your favorite episode?
I can't pick just one! I love them all.
Me too! They're all so good.
I'm glad we have the same taste in TV shows.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
I agree! It's so much fun to talk about TV shows with someone who gets it.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
